entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 9 April 2023
